titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
SHELTON to Feb 27 (postage forward) 1940 13,00
Dec 22 8,30 All This & Heaven Too Jan 20 22 Stars Look Down returned Jan 20
Dec 29 6,50 Wall Jan. 15 " 29 Wickford Point Asylum Jan. 15 1940 Jan 20 8,50 Butterfield 8 Feb. 1 20 Northwest Passage Feb. 1 sent p.c. Jan 15 asking what happened already had this alas 20 0 so sent Wickford Point Februa 1 Feb 1 6,50 Journey Man 1 Drums along the Mohawk. Feb. 22 Feb. 22
Feb 23 8,30 Tree of Liberty March 7 Feb 23 51,10 Little Red Horses March 7 Renewed (by mandat received March 7) 3 mos 2 vols A Prov. postage not paid from February 27 to May 27 1940 110 March 7 4,50 Hope of Heaven March 15 Millies Daughter March 15 March 15 6.50 To Wake the Dead March 29 March 15 Appointment in Samarra March 29 March 29 6.50 Spanish Cape Mystery April 13 March 29 Crock of Gold April 13 March 29 Enchanters Nightshade April 13
wrote from American Hospital April 11 SB replied April 12th (also wrote Ap 13) subscription suspended: a month 2 1/2 left
American Hospital 63 Bd Victor Hugo Reuilly s/ Seine
1939 SHELTON Shelton, Ms. Caroline 1 Bd_ Montparnasse
Chez Madame Hurel Route de la Falaise CAROLLES BOURG 1m2vA (Manche) 40v dep 100v Ap 28 And So, Victoria May 26 28 To Have + To Have Not May 2 May 2 Best Short Stories of 1937l May 23 post 23 Shining + Free June 1 6.50 23 Journalist's Wife June 13 sub ren 1 m 1 v A May 28 - June 28 25- list of books she 10% + 2.50 wants is attached to 27.50 card Temporary adress: chez Mr Laudron Carolles. Bourg. (Marche) 13 4.50 Northwest Passage june 26 11 Total postage to date paid Nov 27 postage to June 28, 1929 11v has dep left 100v - 11v post Mandat Nov 27 included balance 89v to be refunded due for deposit 11 100 present dep. 100 Nov 27 1939 received mandat 121 frs Renewed Nov 27 1939 3 mos 2 vols A Prov 110 Feb 27 1940 postage Nov 27 6,50 Rebecca Dec 9 Not to be Taken Dec 9 Dec 9 6.50 Late George Apley. Dec 22 Dec 9 Why Keep them Alive Dec. 22 13.00
